title: 3dANOVA2
description: This program performs a two-factor Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) on 3D datasets.

type.title: ANOVA Model Type
type.description: Type of ANOVA model to be used: 1=fixed, 2=random, 3=mixed

alevels.title: A Levels
alevels.description: Number of levels of factor A

blevels.title: B Levels
blevels.description: Number of levels of factor B

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Data set for levels of factor A and factor B

diskspace.title: Disk Space Flag
diskspace.description: Print out disk space required for program execution

mask.title: Mask Dataset
mask.description: Use sub-brick #0 of dataset 'mset' to define which voxels to process

amean.title: Estimate Mean A Prefix
amean.description: Estimate mean of factor A level

bmean.title: Estimate Mean B Prefix
bmean.description: Estimate mean of factor B level

xmean.title: Estimate Mean Cell Prefix
xmean.description: Estimate mean of cell at level i of factor A and level j of factor B

adiff.title: Difference A Prefix
adiff.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor A

bdiff.title: Difference B Prefix
bdiff.description: Difference between levels i and j of factor B

xdiff.title: Difference Cell Mean Prefix
xdiff.description: Difference between cell mean at A=i, B=j and cell mean at A=k, B=l

bucket.title: Bucket Prefix
bucket.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset whose sub-bricks are obtained by concatenating the above output files

old_method.title: Old Method Flag
old_method.description: Request to perform ANOVA using the previous functionality (requires -OK, also)

ok.title: OK Flag
ok.description: Confirm understanding that contrasts that do not sum to zero have inflated t-stats, and contrasts that do sum to zero assume sphericity (to be used with -old_method)

assume_sph.title: Assume Sphericity Flag
assume_sph.description: Assume sphericity (zero-sum contrasts, only). This allows use of the old_method for computing contrasts which sum to zero
